item.description:
We are returning to Alba!

Alba is Quincy's premier location for distinguished business and social events.   It's an upscale Mediterranean restaurant in Quincy that Sitzundjibers have previously enjoyed!  We are returning for another fun afterwork cocktail party!   

Fore more info: http://www.alba1486.com

The Alba Restaurant is located in Quincy Square at 1486 Hancock Street (at the intersection of Hancock Street and Cottage Street) in a renovated bank building.  It is easily accessible from the north (Expressway); from the south, Route 3/93, or Route 3A from Hingham, or the Red Line to the Quincy Center.  

 

There is parking on Hancock Street, in lots nearby, and valet parking is available.  

 

Questions?

Contact host Bryan J. Stevens
Email: beja1365@aol.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the private function room.
item.name: Afterwork cocktail party at Alba!
